scheduler

Class Appointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.Appointment

  • public class Appointment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will represent an appointment (== a scheduled resource)

           java.util.HashMap<TimePoint,Resource> res,
           java.util.Date date,
           long dur)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        patient - The patientfile of the patient to whom this appointment belongs to.
        res - All resources needed for this appointment.
        date - The date and time on which this appointment is to take place.
